Name: Royal Booty Quest
About the game: Fused card games and roguelikes together to make the best single player deckbuilder. This game doesn't require internet to play. Doesn't have the energy to limit your time. Doesn't have Ads. It doesn't download any more data. It doesn't collect any data. If you encounter a bug or have a suggestion - report it via feedback, Discord or Email. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power, slay monsters, forge new cards and boil new potions. Every bit will help. Coop - in development. Game features: - 6 Heroes, each with own 70+ cards deck; - 100+ Pixel-art Heroes, Enemies and epic Bosses; - Modding and custom decks; - and lot more! MORE LIKE THIS: Royal Heroes / Royal Offense /
